entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 10:57 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -15.9°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -18.8°C
Wind: N 22 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
